metadata.title: CVE-2023-52704 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:freezer,umh: Fix call_usermode_helper_exec() vs SIGKILL Tetsuo-San notedthat commit f5d39b020809 ("freezer,sched: Rewrite core freezer logic")broke call_usermodehelper_exec() for the KILLABLE case. Specifically it wasmissed that the second, unconditional, wait_for_completion() was notoptional and ensures the on-stack completion is unused before goingout-of-scope.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
